```{r}
feather <- read.csv("GCRF_feather_morpho.csv")
head(feather)
traits <- c("Penn_length", "Penn_number", "Plum_length", "Plum_number", "Nodes")

for (i in traits){
  i <- feather %>%
  group_by(Individual) %>%
  summarize(Avg=mean(i))
  
}


for (i in seq_along(bill_data_list)){
  df <- bill_data_list[[i]]
  col_name <- colnames(df)[7]
  ped_file <- data.frame(bill.PC_ped_file, df[,7])
  colnames(ped_file) <- c("FID", "IID", "PAT", "MAT", "SEX", "PHENOTYPE", "GENOTYPE")
  bill_ped_files[[col_name]] <- ped_file
}
```
